summary: Lima is Peru's capital and biggest city, founded in 1535. It's located near the Pacific Ocean and is the country's political, cultural, and economic hub. The city is divided between Lima Province and Callao Province, with a population of over 10 million people. Lima was once the capital of the Viceroyalty of Peru and is now a major sporting and political event host. It got its name from the native word "Limaq."
title: Lima
